Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts Pool Manava Beach Resort & Spa - Moorea Manava Beach Resort & Spa - Moorea Manava Beach Resort & Spa - Moorea - Pool Manava Beach Resort & Spa - Moorea Le Tahiti by Pearl Resorts - Pool Le Tahiti by Pearl Resort - black sand beach Le Tahiti By Pearl Resorts Tahiti Ultimate Tahiti Island Package - Discover Papeete, Moorea & Bora Bora &vert; 12 Nights • Transfers • Sightseeing Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Discover the magic of French Polynesia with a 12-night escape featuring 5 nights in Moorea, 3 nights in Bora Bora, and 4 nights in Papeete (2 pre and 2 post). Begin your journey at Manava Beach Resort & Spa in Moorea, a charming retreat nestled between Cook’s Bay and the island’s golf course. Just minutes from the airport and ferry, this resort blends luxury with local charm, offering a range of accommodations from garden bungalows to iconic overwater suites, along with a tranquil spa, on-site dive center, and lagoon-side dining. Next, fly to Bora Bora for a 3-night stay at Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts , set on the secluded Motu Tevairoa. Surrounded by crystal-clear waters and postcard-perfect beaches, enjoy luxurious overwater or beachfront villas, a world-class spa, and exceptional dining, all in a setting that perfectly balances tradition and elegance. Enjoy 4 nights (2 pre, 2 post) at Le Tahiti by Pearl Resorts in Papeete, where lush tropical gardens meet a unique black-sand beach overlooking Matavai Bay. Relax in the panoramic pool or spa, and enjoy easy access to the capital’s vibrant markets, cultural sites, and local cuisine. This curated itinerary offers the perfect blend of adventure, relaxation, and authentic Polynesian hospitality. View more View less 12 nights + transfers, sightseeing & more from $ 10,979* per person share twin. Flights are additional. Enquire now Sale Period : until 31 Mar 26 by 4pm or until sold out Deal Includes Air Tahiti Nui: Air Pass Discovery 2 Islands (Economy flights between Moorea to Bora Bora and Bora Bora to Papeete) 5 nights at Manava Beach Resort & Spa in a Garden Pool Bunaglow 3 nights at Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts in a Lagoon Overwater Bungalow 4 nights at Le Tahiti by Pearl Resorts in a Ocean View Room with Kitchen (2 pre/2 post) Return Papeete airport, ferry, Moorea & Bora Bora transfers Moorea Lagoon Tour with lunch on Motu included Bora Bora: Combo Tour 4WD & Snorkelling Safari - Full day (lunch included) Manava Beach Resort & Spa Inclusions American Breakfast daily XPF15,000 spa voucher credit FREE E-paddle ride (1 hour for 2 people) FREE 2x signature cocktails at the bar (1 per person) FREE coral cutting workshop for 2 people FREE Polynesian night with dance show & buffet dinner (no drinks) on Wednesday or Saturday night Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts inclusions American breakfast daily FREE Wi-Fi FREE use of stand up paddle boards & kayaks Le Tahiti by Pearl Resorts inclusions FREE Wi-Fi FREE use of snorkelling equipment Round trip shuttle to downtown Papeete (not available on Saturday afternoon, Sundays & public holidays) Access to sauna, hammam & gym FREE cultural & sporting activities Included sightseeing Moorea: Tasty Moorea Lagoon Tour (Tasty lunch feet in the water included) During your stay in Moorea, embark on a full-day lagoon adventure with Seafari Cruises, where a lively and welcoming atmosphere awaits. Cruise through breathtaking island scenery and discover the rich marine life and vibrant coral gardens with multiple stops for swimming and snorkeling. Relax on board as you enjoy traditional demonstrations like coconut shelling and the colorful pareo show. For lunch, your hosts will serve a delicious BBQ feast with your feet in the water, surrounded by friendly rays and curious sharks. Savor local flavors including raw fish in coconut milk, fresh lagoon fish, grilled meats, tropical fruits, and refreshing drinks. It’s a day filled with laughter, discovery, and true Polynesian hospitality. Bora Bora: Combo Tour 4WD & Snorkelling Safari - Full day (lunch included) Perfect for those looking to experience both the lagoon and island sides of Bora Bora in a single day. Begin your adventure with a 4WD circle island tour, winding through mountain trails to reach scenic viewpoints overlooking the lagoon and the village of Vaitape. Along the way, visit historic World War II sites featuring cannons and bunkers still visible today. Enjoy lunch in a charming local restaurant set in the picturesque area of Matira. In the afternoon, set out on a snorkeling safari in Bora Bora’s stunning lagoon, where you'll explore its vibrant marine life and underwater wonders. Room Types Manava Beach Resort & Spa (Garden Pool Bungalow) + Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts (Lagoon Overwater Bungalow) & Le Tahiti by Pearl Resorts (Ocean View Room with Kitchen) Manava Beach Resort – Garden Pool Bungalow: Set in a lush tropical garden, these Polynesian-style bungalows feature a king bed, single bed, bathroom with shower, and a terrace with a private pool. Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts – Lagoon Overwater Bungalow: This 851 sq ft bungalow offers a lagoon view, spacious bedroom, en-suite bathroom with tub and shower, and a furnished sundeck with gazebo and direct lagoon access. Glass panels near the bed and bathtub showcase the scenery. 12 night accommodation package from $12,139* per person share twin Travel 01 Nov - 30 Nov 25 12 night accommodation package from $10,979* per person share twin Travel 11 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Manava Beach Resort: Excludes Local City Tax XPF200 pp per night - payable direct Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts: Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts: Excludes Local City Tax XPF200 pp per night - payable direct Le Tahiti by Pearl Resorts: Excludes local tax XPF150 per person, per night, and resort fee of XPF1950 per room, per night payable direct If the advertised room type doesn't suit, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Terms & Conditions Sales to 31 Mar 26 or until sold out. Prices correct as at 28 Jul 25. • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases and availability. • Package prices for accommodation and transfers are land only. International and domestic flights are additional. All travel must be commenced and completed as specified. • EXCLUDES: Manava Beach Resort: Excludes Local City Tax XPF200 pp per night - payable direct. Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts: Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts: Excludes Local City Tax XPF200 pp per night - payable direct. Le Tahiti by Pearl Resorts: Excludes local tax XPF150 per person, per night, and resort fee of XPF1950 per room, per night payable direct • Bedding configurations may vary. • Any resort credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & cannot be exchanged for cash. • Food and Beverage credits must be used onsite at their Restaurant and Bar. • Min/max stays apply. • Full payment is required at time of booking. • Availability during holiday & peak travel periods may be limited. • Amendment and cancellation fees apply. • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability. Please talk to your House of Travel consultant for the most up to date availability and pricing. Advertised prices are per person (twin share) based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply. FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. Click here for finance terms and conditions.
